title: Wear Mini Watch Face
summary: Fully customizable interactive watch face with Wear Mini Launcher NOW support.
developerAddress:
No8. Dongbeiwang.W Rd.
Haidian District, Beijing
P.R of China
description: Beautiful and fully customizable interactive watch face. The first ever watch face with Wear Mini Launcher NOW support. With both Wear Mini Launcher and Wear Mini Watch Face installed on your Android Wear Device, you can launch your favorite app, or access toggles / widgets / mini apps right on your watch face.At this very beginning, we have limited selection of toggle, widget and mini app, we will keep working hard to bring more convenience to your fingertip.FeaturesInteractive Actions (Android Wear 1.3 and Wear Mini Launcher 4.1.0 or newer required)- 4 interactive zones available- Launcher any app- Toggle phone WiFi- Find your phoneCustomizable Style- 12 watch face backgrounds- 3 widget backgrounds- 5 dial styles- 2 border styles- Option to show analog watch handCustomizable Color- Watch hand- Dial- Digital display background Compatible Devices- Motorola Moto 360- LG G Watch- Samsung Gear Live- LG G Watch R- Sony SmartWatch 3- Asus Zenwatch- LG G Watch Urbane (Android Wear version)
descriptionHTML:
Beautiful and fully customizable interactive watch face. The first ever watch face with Wear Mini Launcher NOW support. With both Wear Mini Launcher and Wear Mini Watch Face installed on your Android Wear Device, you can launch your favorite app, or access toggles / widgets / mini apps right on your watch face.

At this very beginning, we have limited selection of toggle, widget and mini app, we will keep working hard to bring more convenience to your fingertip.

Features
Interactive Actions (Android Wear 1.3 and Wear Mini Launcher 4.1.0 or newer required)
- 4 interactive zones available
- Launcher any app
- Toggle phone WiFi
- Find your phone

Customizable Style
- 12 watch face backgrounds
- 3 widget backgrounds
- 5 dial styles
- 2 border styles
- Option to show analog watch hand

Customizable Color
- Watch hand
- Dial
- Digital display background

Compatible Devices

- Motorola Moto 360
- LG G Watch
- Samsung Gear Live
- LG G Watch R
- Sony SmartWatch 3
- Asus Zenwatch
- LG G Watch Urbane (Android Wear version)
comments: Installed on Samsung Gear Live, I'm able to customize colors, however any of the options on the watch face only activate the OK Google option.. I tried settings different options but none work.. Am I doing something wrong? Do I need to somehow disable the OK Google option for the options in the center of the watch face to work?

Very nice watch face Love this watch face, my only gripe is that I wish the colour of the watchface itself (not just the hands, numbers and digital display background) could be changed from the dark brown it comes with.
The watch face was always crashing. Couldn't even finish configuring or it crashed. And now I'm not even able to run it from scratch anymore

Stability is a problem, but nice faces Stability seems to be big problem. I downloaded it for my Sony Smartwatch 3. It constantly lags and stops running. Ultimately it will restart the watch. The faces are really nice, but with the stability issues I will uninstall it. Good effort overall.
Not very stable Considering I Paid money for this, I  feel that it's flaky and unstable nature has a lot to be desired. I have better free watch faces. Very dissapointed. Using on a LG Urbane.
Crashed a lot Used with LG urbane crashed constantly, not sure why never had a watch app do this before.  Need updating badly.
